about.story: My name is {name}, I have been interested and growing in the IT sphere for many years. {br} Now I mainly work on {java} and {javascript}. {br} Just below you can find a list of some of my developments, and if you click {hub}, you can try it yourself.

index.about: Welcome! My name is Ilya, I'm a Java and Node.js developer with more than 6 years of experience.
index.contact: You can contact with me using:
index.experience: I specialize in creating Telegram bots and back-end solutions for various projects. Over the years I have managed to cooperate with the Moscow Center for the Development of Professional Education, College of Communications â„–54, StoryTelling team, AltaSoft and dozens of individual customers. I'm always open to new ideas and ready to help bring your project to life!
index.description: RedGuy.ru is a site of an ordinary programmer, where you can learn about me, my projects, as well as use my facilities

access.nickname: Access to your nickname and id

rdnevnik.desc: Telegram and VKontakte interface for accessing a student's electronic diary {link}.{br} Uses natural language processing technology to understand any user's wording.
rdnevnik.slogan: Let's make studying easier on our own.

votty.desc: A specialized bot for voting on your Discord server!

newskingdom.slogan: Time to read all news without leaving a chat.
newskingdom.desc: Telegram bot that collects news from different sources, categorizes and sends to chat.{br} Receiving a new post from the channel, checks it for uniqueness, determines one of the categories: Russia, IT, Russia and the World, Film and Animation, Moscow, Animal World, Positive, Education, Economy, St. Petersburg, then sends this post to the top of this category.
